page.title: 02The New Ice Rink in Oxford.
page.content: In Oxford there is a new ice rink for people to ice skate.It was opened in Dec 1984.Our class of 10-11 year old children is going skating for 10 lessons which are special for schools.It costs ten pounds.There are two instructors for 23 children.The instructors are both Canadian.We have learned Backwards jumps,Scooters, Swivels,T-stops,and Spins.I think ice skating is good because I could not skate and now I am learning.They play ice hockey for a sport and Oxford has a team.I think it is a good job we have a rink in Oxford because anybody can go ice skating and learn to skate. It costs 1.65 for One and a half hours skating. This includes hiring skates.
